key_talking_points: Penalty on Edmonton's Evander Kane for high-sticking Carter Verhaeghe. Florida goes to the power play for 2 minutes at 19:23 remaining in the first period.
Florida leads Edmonton 5-4 early in the first period. Edmonton needs to capitalize on opportunities to close the gap.
for_commentary_agent.context: Focus on the implications of the upcoming power play for Florida. A goal here could widen the lead significantly.

high_intensity_events.summary: Evander Kane (EDM) assessed a penalty for high-sticking on Carter Verhaeghe (FLA) at 19:23 of the first period, giving Florida a power play.

task_details.specific_guidance: The penalty is the key event. Discuss the power play setup and potential scoring chances for Florida.
